attributes.action: endorse and affirm positively the medical decisions of the National Blood Service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to endorse and affirm positively the medical decisions of the National Blood Service in seeking to preserve and maintain the integrity and safety of the blood transfusion service in the UK. We would ask you to affirm the National Blood Service's ability to make medical decisions free of any political considerations. We are confident that present restrictions on the donation of blood, and any future restrictions, will be made purely on the basis of medical knowledge and that the National Blood Service will continue to put the safety of potential recipients of blood donated first.
